ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In them are fruits and date-palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With fruits in them, and dates and pomegranates --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Therein will be fruits and dates and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In both gardens there will be fruits, palm-trees, and pomegranates
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In them are fruits (of all kinds), and dates and pomegranate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: In them (both) will be fruits, and date palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In both are fruits and palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein fruits, and palm-trees, and pomegranates --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein is fruit, the date-palm and pomegranate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: In both of them there will be fruit trees and date-palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In which will be fruit, the date-palm and pomegranate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In both of them will be fruits, date-palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In them will be Fruits, and dates and pomegranates:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: In them (both) will be fruits, and date- palms and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In them are fruits, palm trees and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In them are fruits, and date-palms, and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In both of them are fruit and palm trees and pomegranates.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:68] In both of them will be fruits and date-palms and pomegranates, the [latter] two [fruits] being from among these [fruits of the two gardens]; but it is also said that they belong to [the fruits of] some other [garden].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein) in the two Gardens (is fruit) different kinds of fruit, (the date-palm) different kinds of palm- trees (and pomegranate) different kinds of pomegranate in both taste and shape.
